--WRITE-MODE. BPH113_NEW send the changed values for BTCP/BTPC back as parameter

07.03.2002 SH SCR958 new field BPIV_INVOICETYPE also initialized
-- Need for errorhandling, see T.R.
-- Global virtuals needed in BPH250
-- The BATCH_ID is normaly a numeric (9) field.
-- BPH250 is a asynchron job and called per submit job from #GB701 from
-- PC. The program #GB701 is only able to get and send alphanumeric fields, so
-- we have to converted numeric fields in the calling programs into alphanumeric
-- and in the called program then back to numeric.
-- Delete MQ100
-- Delete MQ101
-- Delete MQ246
-- Delete MQ256
-- Payment code for drafts
-- Open for updates if BTCP_BADP_ID > 0 (BPH252G / BPH252A /BPH252C/ BPH256)
-- BPH256 Used for final updates, only first BTPC row will be used
... used v.BTPC_LINENO to force a re-compute of LinkQuery on BTPC in case of
a new BTPC row is added in BPH250, e.g. in BPH252D for storno bookings
-- BPH252C/BPH256
-- used to delete original BTCP row if payment was moved to another batch
-- used in BPH252A
-- used in BPH252H
-- used in BPH256
used in BPH256
-- BPH252B Delete previous BTCP row which was already moved to an other BATCH,
only relevant for the last record!
... uses v.BTPC_LINENO to force a re-compute of LinkQuery on BTPC in case of
a new BTPC row is added in BPH250, e.g. in BPH252D for storno bookings
-- BPH252B Delete previous BTCP row which was already moved to an other BATCH
-- reset virtuals per record
-- BPH252A - Unallocated payments
-- Calculate exchange difference
// BPH 256 Final Updates at BATCH_PAYMENT in case of A, B or C
-- Finaly Updates to BANK_ACCOUNT_DAILY_PAYMENTS if their are received from
-- bank
// Else if not A, B or C
-- BPH252H Populate MQ174
// BPH256 Final updates at BATCH_PAYMENT
... Cheque updates
... Draft updates
... Report storno bookings
... first determine user that will get the message 71
store MQ071 to report the storno
-- Unallocated payment is:
... not received in a file from the bank but is a cheque or a correction booking
... part of a split payment
-- Get last BADP_LINENO
-- ledger number for exchange rates

Header.Description: BPH 252 B Move payment to new

Text.val: -- Store keyfields of moved payment to BADP
-- The already moved payment has to be deleted from database but only could
-- performed if the BTCP row change in the parenttask otherwise we tried to
-- delete a row which already opened in WRITE mode by a parenttask and this
-- caused the error : "Record BTCP has been changed by another user"

FormName.valUnicode: BPH 252 B Move payment to new

Text.val: -- Correction of current BTACH

FormName.valUnicode: BPH 252 B Move payment to new

Text.val: -- Calc client value date
old BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT row
... uses v.BTPC_LINENO to force a re-compute of LinkQuery on BTPC in case of
a new BTPC row is added in BPH250, e.g. in BPH252D for storno bookings
// Store new BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE rows
-- The bank has also charged the costs
-- Storno tests if finance has to be restored
... uses v.BTPC_LINENO to force a re-compute of LinkQuery on BTPC in case of
a new BTPC row is added in BPH250, e.g. in BPH252D for storno bookings
old BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICES
-- In case of exchange differences, currency recalculations have to be skipped
... fetch min BTPC_LINENO (reason why using Index 1)
... uses in T.S. to check if DRFT could be deleted
-- Set invoice number and markcode
... get max invoice number
... check if other invoices are paid, in this case we don't use max. invoice nr.
... get max markcode
... check if all paid invoices have the same markcode, if not we don't use the
markcode
-- Message for legal department (MQ174)

Comment.val:
The module BPH256 - Final updates at BATCH_PAYMENT level
is placed in the RS of 'table BATCH_PAYMENT row'
and this task (BPH256_001 DraftUpdates) is only a part of BPH256 module
(AK 26.09.2007)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BTPC_MUTADEBTORS) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BTPC where BTPC_BTCH_ID = :2 and BTPC_BTCP_LINENO = :3 for fetch only

Text.val: Where status<>2 clause
-- Fetch BTCP_CURRENCYACC from first BTCP row (DO NOT REMOVE THE INDEX)
Additional test confidential clients (SCR9501 ak)
link to the first row to get the ADMNO and CLNTNO
(if BATCH_IMMEDIATEBOOKING='Y'-then the whole batch is
for only one client )
link on INTR_SCHT_NO_INVOICES
link on INTR_SCHT_NO_MARKCODES
End Additional test confidential clients (SCR9501 ak)
-- Test if there are any BATCH_PAYMENT rows where BTCP_STATUS < 2
... if exists then not all payments are finally booked in the BPH250 modules
Possible reasons: Program bugs, IBM PTF problems, ...
-- Book batch amount
... set v.TMPL_AMOUNTDEBITC
-- Cross administration bookings
-- Book batch immediately and not at the end of the day
-- Change invoice codes if changes were made
-- Finally we move 2 to BTCH_STATUS and GNRL_ACTIVEDATE to BTCH_CASHREPORTDATE to avoid double handling:

ExpSyntax.val: 'Not all payments are handeld properly, closing of batch not possible (2. Test)'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BTCP_AMOUNTCURRACC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BTCP where BTCP_BTCH_ID = :2 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Calculation per distinct BTPC_ADMNO/BTPC_CLNTNO

SQL_STMT_U.val: select TMPL_ADMNO, cast(sum(TMPL_AMOUNTDEBITH - TMPL_AMOUNTCREDITH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/TMPL where TMPL_BTCH_ID = :2 group by TMPL_ADMNO order by TMPL_ADMNO for fetch only

select BTPC_ADMNO, BTPC_CLNTNO, cast(sum(BTPC_MUTAFACTORING + BTPC_MUTASETTLEMENT + BTPC_MUTARETENTION + BTPC_MUTADISPUTES + BTPC_MUTAEXTFIN) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/BTPC where BTPC_BTCH_ID = :2 and BTPC_STATUS = 2 and BTPC_CLNTNO > 0 group by BTPC_ADMNO, BTPC_CLNTNO order by BTPC_ADMNO, BTPC_CLNTNO for fetch only

select BTPC_ADMNO, BTPC_CLNTNO from :1/BTPC join :1/CMCD on CMCD_ADMNO = BTPC_ADMNO and CMCD_CLNTNO = BTPC_CLNTNO and CMCD_MARKCODE = :2 and CMCD_EXTRAFINANCEH > 0 where BTPC_BTCH_ID = :3 group by BTPC_ADMNO, BTPC_CLNTNO order by BTPC_ADMNO, BTPC_CLNTNO for fetch only
